prng.generator

Class IsaacRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • prng.generator.IsaacRandom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class IsaacRandom
extends Random
    The ISAAC random number generator is a cryptographically secure generator inspired by the RC4 cipher. This implementation incorporates the suggested changes for the ISAAC+ algorithm. Additionally, when setSeed is called, the new seed is combined with the existing state so that entropy is augmented, not reset.
    See Also:
    ISAAC on Wikipedia, ISAAC+ algorithm, Serialized Form

      IsaacRandom(String seed)
      Create a generator using each character from the seed as one integer in the seed.
